content.rendered:
About the Role

Viralistic.nl is looking for a creative and skilled Video Editor & Creator intern who thrives on making engaging short-form content. You will be responsible for editing, filming, and transforming raw footage into high-performing videos for social media platforms.

What You’ll Do

  • Edit short-form video content in Premiere Pro
  • Receive and organize raw footage, turning it into high-quality shorts, reels, and TikToks
  • Film and produce dynamic video content when needed
  • Optimize videos for maximum engagement and virality
  • Work closely with our creative team to bring ideas to life

Who You Are

  • Passionate about video content and social media trends
  • Experienced with Premiere Pro (After Effects is a plus)
  • Skilled in storytelling and editing techniques
  • Able to work independently and meet deadlines
  • Bonus: Experience with filming and camera work

What We Offer

• A hands-on experience in a fast-growing media environment

• The opportunity to build a strong portfolio

• Guidance and mentorship

• A creative and dynamic workspace

Interested?

Send your CV, portfolio, or a short video showcasing your editing skills to info@viralistic.nl.

‍
